name: Space Rescue (Sliced Games Studios, Draxen, MrFunkyland)
name_original: Space Rescue (Sliced Games Studios, Draxen, MrFunkyland)
description:
Xorg is in danger! 

His ship is damaged and he is in an area full of asteroids! Izzy runs to rescue him in his armed ship.

Use WASD to move Izzy's spacecraft through pulses and shoot the asteroids with the left mouse button.

Remember that Izzy can only fire ONE SHOOT at a time before reloading the cannon! Also avoid hitting or impacting Xorg's spacecraft otherwise you'll lower his life points!

Your goal is to get as many points as possible before Xorg's spacecraft is destroyed by the asteroids.

Credits

Soundtracks: https://mrfunkyland.itch.io/

Art: https://draxen93.itch.io/
